fields.Title: Marketing to Attract Teacher Hopefuls (MATH): An MTE-Partnership Research Action Cluster
fields.Description/Abstract:
Led Cynthia Anhalt, University of Arizona, Laurie Cavey, Boise State University. Ed Dickey, University of South Carolina, and Maria Fernandez, Florida International University, the MATH RAC is a national partnership to address the problem of mathematics teacher recruitment by (1) providing a model for developing and launching purposeful and sustained marketing campaign, (2) including adaptions for programs focusing on undergraduates, UTeach, alternative pathways, and other models, and (3) identifying critical experiences both related to mathematics and clinical experiences that impact recruitment.
  

Role:  Supporting
